Input File Structure
====================
Start from Basecalling
______________________
Start the pipeline from Basecalling

::
   
    YourWorkSpace/
    ├── 1          
    │   ├── *.fast5
    │   └── ......
    ├── 2
    │   ├── *.fast5
    │   └── ......  
    ├── 1_read1*.fastq(.gz)
    ├── 1_read2*.fastq(.gz)          
    ├── 2_read1*.fastq(.gz)
    └── 2_read2*.fastq(.gz)
